## Events

| Event                 | Description                                                                                                        | Type                |
| --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `dnnRmFoldersChanged` | Fires when there is a possibility that some folders have changed. Can be used to force parts of the UI to refresh. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
